sentences: Maa pöörlemise mõjul kalduvad tuuled põhjapoolkeral paremale.
context: The Estonian word 'paremale' is an adverb that means 'to the right' or 'right'. It indicates direction towards the right side. In the context of politics, it can also refer to a shift in ideology toward conservatism. The word comes from the adjective 'parem' (better/right) and follows the case pattern where '-le' is added for allative case direction.
